## `SetGraphLogoImage`

Sets the image\index{images!logos} to be used for a logo on all graphs.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetGraphLogoImage(string imageFilePath)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`string` imageFilePath | The filepath to the image to use for graph logos.
